name: @ungap/event
description: An Event polyfill for legacy browsers.

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run esm && npm run min && npm run test && npm run size
scripts.cjs: cat index.js | sed 's/var self.*/var self = {};/' > cjs/index.js && echo 'module.exports = self.Event;' >> cjs/index.js
scripts.esm: cat index.js | sed 's/var self.*/var self = {};/' > esm/index.js && echo 'export default self.Event;' >> esm/index.js
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c && cat min.js | wc -c && gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c && cat min.js | brotli | wc -c

author: Andrea Giammarchi
